isys::IApplicationEnvironment

isys::IApplicationEnvironment Class Reference
[Defines access to operating system dependent implementation]

Interface for access of some system dependent features and infos. More...

Detailed Description

Interface for access of some system dependent features and infos.

virtual istd::CStringList isys::IApplicationEnvironment::GetApplicationArguments (  )  const [pure virtual]

Returns the arguments of command line for running application process.

Implemented in iqt::CApplicationEnvironment.

virtual EnvironmentVariables isys::IApplicationEnvironment::GetEnvironmentVariables (  )  const [pure virtual]

Returns the environment variables of the application process.

The key of the EnvironmentVariables map is the name of the environment variable.

Implemented in iqt::CApplicationEnvironment.

virtual istd::CString isys::IApplicationEnvironment::GetModulePath ( bool  useApplicationModule = false,
bool  onlyDirectory = false 
) const [pure virtual]

Returns the module file name.

If the useApplicationModule is true returns the name of application file/directory, otherwise the file name or (directory path) of module in which context this function was called. if onlyDirectory is true only directory path will be returned.

Implemented in iqt::CApplicationEnvironment.
